name: Brilliant Stylers Travel Size Holiday Set CAN
about: What it is:A set of hairstyling products to perfect your hair on the go, including adding volume and texture, cleaning hair, and setting a style..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Instant, revivable, long-lasting volume and texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair..Ingredient Callouts:These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:A brilliant trio of bestsellers. Perfect your hair on the go with these stylers that add volume and texture, actually clean hair, and set style—all conveniently sized to fit your lifestyle. This set features the award-winning dry shampoo..This Set Contains:- 3 oz/ 95 mL Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray.Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair..-Conditioning Emollient: Adds lubricity, brushability, and shine..-Fast-Absorbing
